events.eventSummary: A user reported losing their pension due to a scam or phishing incident.
A user reported a potential scam attempt.
A Microsoft Teams flaw in guest chat exposes users to malware attacks.
A user reported being hacked with a ripple-wallet.

Data leaks spanning five years on JSONFormatter and one year on CodeBeautify have affected organizations in critical infrastructure, government, finance, telecom, healthcare, aerospace, and cybersecurity.

dailyBrief: High-impact cyber events dominated the day, with reports of significant financial loss due to scams, a major Microsoft Teams vulnerability exposing users to malware, a ripple-wallet hack, and extensive multi-year data leaks affecting critical infrastructure and key industries. The prevalence of scams and leaks indicates ongoing targeting of individuals and organizations, while the Teams exploit highlights the persistent risks in mainstream collaboration platforms. Immediate attention and mitigation are recommended given the elevated threat level.
